# Norica Spa

Norica Spa is a laser hair removal clinic and aesthetic academy in Montreal, QC, Canada.
We specialize in medical-grade laser hair removal using GentleMax Pro technology, Dermalogica facials and skin treatments, and professional laser technician training.
We also offer a GentleMax Pro rental program with training and support for practitioners.

## Services
- Laser hair removal
- Facials and skin treatments (Dermalogica)
- Laser memberships
- Laser training academy (certification program)
- GentleMax Pro rental program

## Location
105 rue Chabanel Ouest, Montreal, QC H2N 2G9, Canada

## Contact
Phone: (514) 550-4633
